articles.title: This couple quit their jobs to live in a van and travel across Europe - here's how they do it | Life - News24
articles.description: The van, which cost them R68 000 to purchase and another R248 500 to renovate, also serves as their home.
articles.content:
• A UK couple quit their jobs and bought a van which they now use to travel across Europe.
